name: 2DPlatformer (pahmel0)
description:
A 2D platformer game made by a student of NTNU university in Norway in a game development course.

Modifications:

1. New game

2. 2 selectable levels

3. Instructions

4. Exit game

Credits: https://www.coursera.org/learn/game-design-and-development-2/home/week/1

Created by Mantas Bagdonavicius
